entities.name: bole
entities.description: Bole was closing in on Harry and Derrick.

entities.name: derick
entities.description: Derrick zoomed toward Harry with Bole.

entities.name: lee jordan
entities.description: Lee Jordan yelled 'Ha haaa!' as the Slytherin Beaters lurched away from each other.

entities.name: flint
entities.description: Flint scored a goal for Slytherin.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall tried to take the magical megaphone away from Lee Jordan.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry had a glimpse of Bole and Derrick zooming toward him.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood was trying to save the goal.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina poked Flint in the eye (jokingly).

relationships.description: Bole and Derrick collided with a sickening crunch.
Lee swore so badly that Professor McGonagall tried to take the magical megaphone away from him.
Flint was flying toward the Gryffindor goal posts.
Lee Jordan yelled 'Ha haaa!' as the Slytherin Beaters lurched away from each other.
Flint scored a goal for Slytherin.
Wood was trying to save the goal.
